embed.description: Personal project Is the first time I make a skin concept Sorry for the bad quality, artstation accept file under 10MB :c

replies.body: Ooooo pretty

> [{quoted}](name=Riot jinxylord,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=76pu57oe,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2018-08-09T19:15:12.988+0000)
>
> Ooooo pretty

So Is this a clever teaser for the morg rework.
Or am i overthinking things

> [{quoted}](name=Riot jinxylord,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=76pu57oe,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2018-08-09T19:15:12.988+0000)
>
> Ooooo pretty

You made my day more beautiful, ty <3
You know, when they VGU her, this would be a great replacement for Exiled Morgana.

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=76pu57oe,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-09T13:18:26.319+0000)
>
> You know, when they VGU her, this would be a great replacement for Exiled Morgana.

I thought it would be a good skin considering she was an angel, she deserve it.{{champion:25}}
Well, Exile was already along those lines, so instead of stepping on it, they could replace it like they did with Crimson Akali-> Infernal Akali.

I always thought of Exiled Morgana as "I've just made my transformation into 'Fallen Angel'" Morgana. Like Exiled is what she looked like just as she made whatever decision she made to break apart from Kayle's society, so she still looks somewhat similar to Kayle, but her tattered wings indicate her "fallen" status. The "Exiled" here meaning the society (or Kayle, no idea what direction the new lore is going to go) exiled Morgana, so she's going to go off and eventually become the purple-y Morgana we know and love. That's how I always interpreted the skin anyways.
You're not wrong, but it's still Morgana as she was, uncorrupted, much like Arclight is. And the lore around the skin depends heavily on how she's going to be written with her VGU.
perhaps Justicar would be a better fit
You did a really good job. It looks really nice. I would totally use this if it were a real skin. Morgana looks really pretty and the detail you put into it is amazing.

Looks nice, but my teacher would've said: "Missed the point".
Morgana is not white and golden and shiny. That really is like making Lux a darkness-loving villain with long, black hairs.

> [{quoted}](name=Biff the Bard,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=76pu57oe,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2018-08-09T19:12:34.827+0000)
>
> Looks nice, but my teacher would've said: "Missed the point".
> Morgana is not white and golden and shiny. That really is like making Lux a darkness-loving villain with long, black hairs.


{{champion:161}}  {{champion:83}} and {{champion:110}} got a arclight skin too and they are not "golden and shiny and white" <3
I feel like this is what her Exiled skin should be when she gets her visual update.
I hope not. Exiled should remain a canon skin like Capatain Fortune/Gankplank and Human Ryze. Making it an Arclight would mean it would become an alternate universe skin and I wouldn't want that.
i love it :D Kayle should get an evil looking skin too :o
Wow GJ!
Id buy and still use sinful succulence haha

OMG, bro, OMG! That's brilliant!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
That's gorgeous! Morg is one of my favorite champs too, wonderful job
i like it {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
This is siiiiick! I love everything about it. Her ultimate as a golden chain of justice is awesome too.
I WANT AS A {{champion:25}}  MAIN I NEED IT
Looks really nice! The pool looks like Arclight yorick's cage before it spawns tho.

> [{quoted}](name=MOLTinaTOR,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=76pu57oe,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2018-08-09T17:08:06.720+0000)
>
> Looks really nice! The pool looks like Arclight yorick's cage before it spawns tho.

actually, i inspired myself from all the arclight skins for this skin, I wanted the elements to be the same.
Ah I see!

This is great. I love the colors (how did you make that grey accent look so good?). And the way you made consistent use of those golden arcs (no pun intended) throughout, not just on the wings.

I'm a little worried that some of the details wouldn't be visible in the actual game, where it would be much smaller. For instance, the crest on the bottom-front of her dress (especially the inside part) feels like it could be more impactful.
Nice Kayle skin! +1

Nice work.

Too bad this will be outdated once the rework comes.
Damn, morg is the perfect champ for this theme.
This is great. Would totally work for an Exiled upgrade.

I LOVE it!

I actually think Riot could do everything like this, and then add that whispy transparency effect for the lower part of her wings? They only use it for a few things but this would totally deserve it!
I think it would look even better if the upper part of her wings and her horns were a lighter shade of yellow

> [{quoted}](name=Marothennan,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=76pu57oe,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-08-09T15:40:03.535+0000)
>
> I think it would look even better if the upper part of her wings and her horns were a lighter shade of yellow

I tried to do this but it did not come out, I repeat, it's the first time I draw a skin{{sticker:cass-cry}}
I love it. They should make it one of the higher tier skins so she gets a new VO with it.
Beautiful!
You have talent! Can i request a Shaco skin concept from you?
I play morg and I remember getting exiled morgana in a chest and not caring a few years ago but I consider not using the skin sometimes--
Damn, I would like to have that skin :-).
